title: Visualizing Deliberation
text:
You are viewing a discussion from an online deliberation platform. Unlike a linear comment thread, this Knowledge Graph reveals the structural and semantic patterns hidden in the text.

An AI has analyzed the debate to extract keywords and group arguments into thematic clusters.

title: The Subject
text: The Subject (Blue) is the root of the discussion. Everything connects back to this central topic.

title: The Positions
text: Positions (Orange) are the distinct viewpoints users have taken. They act as the main branches of the debate.

title: Arguments
text: Arguments are the individual contributions. Green nodes support a position (IN FAVOR), while Red nodes oppose it (AGAINST).

title: Thematic Clusters
text: Clusters (Background Areas) are generated by AI. It groups arguments that discuss similar themes, helping you identify the main topics of contention.

title: Keywords
text: Keywords (Purple Diamonds) are semantic bridges extracted by AI. They connect arguments that use the same key concepts, linking different parts of the conversation.

title: Node Size & Influence
text:
Node Size represents influence: larger nodes have more connections.
Proximity suggests similarity or direct interaction.

title: Explore Freely
text:
You are now free to explore.
• Click nodes to read details.
• Use the Timeline to replay the debate.
• Use Filters to analyze specific patterns.
